=== Current Position ===

(row = 1, col = 19)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 1, col = 19)

The current position of the avatar is (1, 19) and the last position was the same, indicating that it has not moved. Based on the map, there are several options to act:

- **Immediate surroundings**:
  - To the left (1, 18): empty space (.)
  - To the right (1, 20): key (*)
  - Up (0, 19): key (k)
  - Down (2, 19): key (k)

Since collecting a key is beneficial for navigating locked areas and since keys can only be held one at a time, I will choose to move right to collect the key on (1, 20).

``` Action: 2 ```
This action moves the avatar right to collect a key, aligning with the strategy of exploration and resource management.
